sentences.en: an auspicious start to the new school year
Auspicious signs are not a superstition, but a confirmation.
sentences.cn: 吉兆的出现不是迷信, 而是肯定.

sentences.en: I'm pleased that you've made such an auspicious start to the new term.
sentences.cn: 你新学期开门红使我很高兴.

sentences.en: In Greece there were great rejoicings over this auspicious event.
sentences.cn: 在希腊,这件喜事引起了广大的庆祝.

sentences.en: It is believed to help keep It'safe and is an auspicious symbol.
sentences.cn: 据信这有助于保护建筑物的安全,并被视作吉祥之物.

sentences.en: It's an auspicious year for your career.
sentences.cn: 您今年在事业方面的运势很旺.

sentences.en: Lanterns contain many, legends and stories and auspicious idioms.
sentences.cn: 很多传说和民间故事都在灯里,吉祥的谚语也都在灯里.

sentences.en: Many happy return of this auspicious day to you.
No Spaniard had been seen. Nobody had entered or left the alley. Everything was auspicious.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人没露面, 巷子里也没人走动, 一切平安无事.

sentences.en: On the reverse the same inscription is repeated, besides a row of five Swastikas as auspicious symbols signifying security and good luck.
sentences.cn: 倒转的同样碑刻是重复的，此外一排五个纳粹党所用的十字记号如幸运的符号表示安全和好运。

sentences.en: Our business will be prosperous, if your auspicious remarks are any indication.
sentences.cn: 有了您的口彩,我们的生意一定会更加兴隆!

sentences.en: Pray receive my sincerest congratulations on this auspicious day.
The company got business when it just opened. What an auspicious sign!
sentences.cn: 公司刚刚开业就做成了这笔买卖,真是讨了个利市呀!

sentences.en: The first of next month is an auspicious day; they will call for you then.
sentences.cn: 下个月初一是个好日子, 冯家就要在那天接人.

sentences.en: The new boy had an auspicious first day in the elementary school.
sentences.cn: 这个新来的男孩在小学校里有幸运的第一天。

sentences.en: Warm and auspicious, I may really feel your breath.
sentences.cn: 温馨而祥和, 我可以真实地感受你的气息.

sentences.en: With favorable weather conditions it was an auspicious moment to set sail.
sentences.cn: 风和日丽,正是扬帆出海的黄道吉日.

words.tran_cn: 吉祥地；吉兆地；繁荣昌盛地

phrases.tran_cn: 好日子；吉日良辰；黄道吉日

trans.tran_cn: 有前途的，有希望的，有利的，吉利的
trans.tran_en: showing that something is likely to be successful
